Title: The Cobalt Short Sleeve Linen Fenbrook Print Casual Shirt

Title: The Navy Tobin Linen Printed Seersucker Casual Shirt

Title: The Dark Blue Short Sleeve Snyder Fine Denim Casual Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This is denim like never before From the experts at Albiate in Italy this ultra lightweight short sleeve shirt is perfect for the warm days ahead This deep blue denim shirt was made for backyard barbecues and days at the beach Finished with a French placket for a contemporary casual look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Albiate in Italy Collar Button down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Hem Balanced hem for untucked wear Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Length Shortened for untucked or tucked wear Buttons Smoke buttons reinforced with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Blue Short Sleeve Wysall Stripe Casual Shirt

Title: The White Bancroft Poplin Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>It s time to rethink what you know about luxury poplin Introducing our most luxurious white shirt yet The Bancroft Poplin is composed of Gatsby Egyptian cotton known for its strength and ultrafine yarn size Renowned Italian mill Thomas Mason grows this incredible cotton on the banks of the Nile River and crafted this rich poplin with an incredibly soft feel and light weight A perfect shirt for any formal or business occasion all year round Fabric 100 Egyptian Cotton sourced from luxury Italian mill Thomas Mason Collar The Ledbury Mid Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a trim fit throughout the torso Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Pink Cloverly Check Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Give your business dress rotation an upgrade The Cloverly check is woven from 120s doubles ultrafine twill Extremely soft for all day comfort and compactly woven to prevent a sheer appearance No ordinary check the pattern is created by reversing the twill weave on the warp yarn to create visual interest Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from the world s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in tailored fit with a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>15 / 34</string><variant>31431967113303</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15.5 / 34</string><variant>31431967146071</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16 / 35</string><variant>31431967178839</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16.5 / 35</string><variant>31431967211607</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>17 / 36</string><variant>31431967244375</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17.5 / 36</string><variant>31431967277143</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>18.5 / 37</string><variant>31431967309911</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The White Astor Poplin Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>There s nothing better than a classic style done right That s why we created the Astor Poplin Crafted from 100s doubles poplin from Tessitura Monti in Italy this Egyptian cotton poplin is smooth crisp and lightweight This versatile style is bound to become a weekly favorite Fabric 100 cotton sourced from Tessitura Monti in Italy Collar The Quintessential collar The perfect multi purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Dark Blue Indigo Arnett Casual Shirt

Title: The Pecan Delmont Herringbone Sport Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Delmont is one of our favorites this year This herringbone linen creates tons of visual texture lending interest and depth Perfect for a summer wedding or evening out the Delmont is unlined with a soft shoulder for a contemporary flattering fit Layer it over a pop of color or an essential Oxford for an effortless look Fabric 100 Linen Fit Our Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Dry Clean Only nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>31311141568599</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>38</string><variant>31311141601367</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>31311141634135</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>42</string><variant>31311141666903</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>44</string><variant>31311141699671</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>46</string><variant>31311141732439</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Blue Westland Check Sport Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>We think every man should have a good check sport coat This classic check in a tonal blue is almost as much a staple as a navy sport coat Crafted with 100 wool and fully lined The Westland is a sharp polished sport coat fit for the office or your next weekend event Fabric 100 Wool Fit Our Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is fully lined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Dry Clean Only nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>31311138455639</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>38</string><variant>31311138488407</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>31311138521175</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>42</string><variant>31311138553943</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>44</string><variant>31311138586711</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>46</string><variant>31311138619479</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>As sharp as a sport coat as comfortable as a cardigan The Admore Sport Coat is knit from a lightweight blend of linen and cotton resulting in a soft breathable fabric This unlined jacket features a soft shoulder for a contemporary fit and handsome drape We recommend sizing up in this jacket Fabric 55 Linen 45 Cotton Fit Our Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Dry Clean Only nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>31311140388951</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>38</string><variant>31311140421719</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>31311140454487</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>42</string><variant>31311140487255</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>44</string><variant>31311140520023</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>46</string><variant>31311140552791</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Cambria is a summer must have Lightweight breathable linen is woven into an oatmeal colored jacket resulting in something that looks fitting for the coast Whether at sea or on land this light colored jacket is perfect for layering over chambray or Oxford for the ultimate dressy casual look Fabric 100 Linen Fit Our Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Dry Clean Only nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="false"><string>36</string><variant>31311141044311</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>38</string><variant>31311141077079</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>31311141109847</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>42</string><variant>31311141142615</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>44</string><variant>31311141175383</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>46</string><variant>31311141208151</variant></size></sizes></sections>
